q: Friday night, Detroit is looking for a complete game to extend that winning streak. "The best part about it is we struggled at times in the game but we got it done," Allen Iverson said. We're going into the next game with some confidence. We're on a back-to-back so it's important for us to go get our rest and get ready to play. It's going to be a good measuring stick for us. But Barclays said while Chrysler's fourth quarter and 2010 results fell short of its estimates, the research shop is sanguine about Chrysler. Overall, results are reassuring, in our view, as the continued launch costs in 2011 are mitigated by increasing volumes and strong product/mix benefits from the introduction of new models, Barclays said in its research note. many unanswered questions about too many important people, companies and institutions...[ This] suggests that David Cameron 's lack of judgment over Andy Coulson is even more striking." uncomfortable questions remain for the prime minister. This affair casts serious doubt on the prime minister's judgment. He saw fit to appoint Mr Andy Coulson as the Conservative party's director of communications when the former editor was tarred by association with the phone-hacking scandal. Why would he want such a compromised spokesman? Was he naive enough to believe Mr Andy Coulson 's assurances? Or did he not care about what had taken place? Neither scenario is very comforting.
